p: The electrical conductivity of TVH was 449±1.73 mS/cm. According to the EU, the maximum limit value of electrical conductivity for thyme honey is 800 μS/cm [ 35]. The electrical conductivity of TVH lies in the range of Iranian honey (210 and 1120 μS/cm), Spanish honey (89 and 1213 μS/cm), and Indian honey (330 and 940 μS/cm) [ 30, 36]. It was found that electrical conductivity has a correlation with the mineral content of honey, and it is usually used for routine honey quality control and to determine its botanical origin [ 33, 37].
